Onboarding Image 2 Track Profile Statistics Monitor who visits your profile, find secret admirers, and get insights on your engagement. Onboarding Image 3
Extract Data Your privacy is important to us. We only analyze the data you see on your Instagram profile and do not store your login credentials. Please log in to your Instagram account Instagram page loaded. Please log in. Login successful! Ready to extract data. Starting process… Navigating to home page… Checking stories… Checking stories… (Attempt %1$d/%2$d) Stories check failed, going to profile page… Navigating to profile page… Collecting profile statistics… Profile information retrieved. Going to following page… User: %1$s, Posts: %2$d, Followers: %3$d, Following: %4$d Accessing following list… Following button not found, retrying… Collecting following list… Found %d people you follow Returning to profile page… Accessing followers list… %d followers visible, collecting data… Followers list could not be opened, retrying… Followers could not be loaded, retrying… Followers data retrieval failed, retrying… Found %d followers Process complete. Results shown on new page. An error occurred. Profile not found, retrying… Stories processed (%d). Going to profile page… Followers loaded successfully.
